snippet.title: Avium Gameplay, Part 13
snippet.description:
#unrealengine5 #Avium #scifi #rpg #cyberpunk 

All content from previous gameplays is still available through the Arcade in the Main Menu. Story Mode now starts directly in Central Avium, featuring new storylines and segments.

Part 14: https://youtu.be/paL6cUEozTw?list=PLZvduhC1r4pPAkxUUAaG_eV67llNn2I7r
Check out the Ultra Wide Format Playlist
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZvduhC1r4pNhgR_FuX2L0e87-B_azVTu&si=aKtGoHl8QY-bZk1o

A city that thrives on the edge of Cyberpunk style, but isn't ALL neon and EDM. As the player, you'll soon find yourself off on other planets in an epic sci-fi and get to witness heroes devolve to bloodthirsty villains along your journey to redemption and the end of corruption.
